sentences.sContent: 10 companies' ex-dividend stock prices including Xinyu Iron & Steel Co. , Ltd. 's will be less than 10 yuan, becoming dual concept stocks of low-cost + high transfer.
sentences.sContent_eng: 10 companies' ex-dividend stock prices including Xinyu Iron & Steel Co. , Ltd. 's will be less than 10 yuan, becoming dual concept stocks of low-cost + high transfer.
sentences.sCn: 新钢股份等10家公司除权除息后股价将不足10元，成为低价+高送转双概念股。
